entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Lac-Mégantic
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero with frost. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero with frost. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
